character.age: 250 years old, yet appears to be in her mid-20s due to elven aging
character.background: Eira was born in the mystical forest of Elvendom, where she demonstrated exceptional magical abilities from a young age. She was taken under the wing of the ancient elf lord, Thalion, who trained her in the arcane arts.
character.place_of_birth: Elvendom, a realm of ancient magic
